exceptions.tactic: intros P x b a Hltax Hltxb Hforally.
intros P' x b a Hltax Hltxb Hforally.
intros P' x' b a Hltax Hltxb Hforally.
intros P' x' b' a Hltax Hltxb Hforally.
intros P' x' b' a' Hltax Hltxb Hforally.

original: intros P x b a Hltax Hltxb Hforally. unfold locally. apply Rbar_lt_locally with a b x. - apply Hltax. - apply Hltxb. - intros y Hy. apply Hforally. + apply Rbar_lt_le_trans with a; auto. + apply Rbar_lt_le_trans with b; auto.
